title: The Zombie Wizards of Ala-ka
description: Unemployed couch surfer, Ta, finds a want ad with those special No experience necessary. As A Zombie Wizard. Soon Ta find himself chasing zombies, dealing with toxic waste spills and chewing his way through an industrial sized box of cookies. Can an apprentice Wizard learn the secrets of the Universal Solvent and keep the balance between the living and the dead?
author: Linda    Armstrong
